name: Stealth Doctor
description:
In Corona`s time, every care with health is just not enough, and people need help to always remain healthy and free from diseases. For that Dylan a doctor of great renown decides that he himself will help people to stay free of diseases. This is not an easy task, he will have to face great dangers like “COVDEL-25”, a dangerous flu, that leaves people very weak. To keep people away from diseases Dylan will have to lead patients to a disease-free place, where people receive treatment or are submitted to a disinfection process against diseases and receive information on how to take care and avoid contracting these diseases as much as possible.

How to play

  - Be hitted by COVIDEL-25 make you loose lifes (you just have 4 lifes)

  - If you loose all lifes, you die and need to restart again

  - 1 click: move the doctor to where you clicked

  - 2cliks: make the doctor run to where you clicked

Credits

  - Willian Carvalho (Gameplay programming, Enemy IA, Game design)

  - Rafael Ferreita (Game design, UI/UX, map generator programming)

  - Arthur Fernando lucas (Game design, concept artist, tech artist, character artist)

  - Igor Musallan Alves (Level artist, icon artist,  level design, Story writer)

  -  Luis Felipe Lozano (Community manager)
